Package net.minecraftforge.client.event

Class InputEvent.ClickInputEvent

java.lang.Object
net.minecraftforge.eventbus.api.Event
net.minecraftforge.client.event.InputEvent
net.minecraftforge.client.event.InputEvent.ClickInputEvent
Enclosing class:
InputEvent
public static class InputEvent.ClickInputEvent
extends InputEvent

Fired when a keybinding that involves clicking the mouse buttons is triggered.

The key bindings that trigger this event are:

  • Attack - defaults to left mouse click
  • Use Item - defaults to right mouse click
  • Pick Block - defaults to middle mouse click

This event is cancellable, and does not have a result. If this event is cancelled, then the keybind's action is not processed further, and the hand will be swung according to shouldSwingHand()

This event is fired on the main Forge event bus, only on the logical client.

See Also:
ForgeHooksClient.onClickInput(int, KeyBinding, Hand)

  • Method Details

    • setSwingHand

      public void setSwingHand​(boolean value)

      Sets whether to swing the player entity's hand. This takes effect even if the event is cancelled. The default value is true.

      Parameters:
      value - whether to swing the hand

    • shouldSwingHand

      public boolean shouldSwingHand()

      Returns whether to swing the player entity's hand. This takes effect even if the event is cancelled.

      Returns:
      Whether to swing the hand
      See Also:
      setSwingHand(boolean)

    • getHand

      public net.minecraft.util.Hand getHand()

      Returns the hand which triggered this event.

      The event will be called for both hands if this is a use item action, regardless of both event's cancellation. This will always be Hand#MAIN_HAND if this is an attack or pick block input.

      Returns:
      The hand causing the input

    • isAttack

      public boolean isAttack()

      Returns if the clicked mouse button is the left mouse button.

      This is named due to the left mouse button being the default Attackkeybind.

      Returns:
      if the mouse button is the left mouse button

    • isUseItem

      public boolean isUseItem()

      Returns if the clicked mouse button is the right mouse button.

      This is named due to the right mouse button being the default Use Itemkeybind.

      Returns:
      if the mouse button is the right mouse button

    • isPickBlock

      public boolean isPickBlock()

      Returns if the clicked mouse button is the middle mouse button.

      This is named due to the middle mouse button being the default Pick Blockkeybind.

      Returns:
      if the mouse button is the middle mouse button

    • getKeyBinding

      public net.minecraft.client.settings.KeyBinding getKeyBinding()

      Returns the KeyBinding that triggered this event.

      Returns:
      The keybinding that triggered this event
